mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CODE ( user_id, , code_title, code_level, code_problemid ) VALUES (#{userId}, 1, 'code_title', 'code_level', 1)
mapper.select: WITH date_count AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(code_solvedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS code_solvedate, COUNT(user_id) AS solved FROM code WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND TO_CHAR(code_solvedate, 'YYYY-MM') = #{month} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(code_solvedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) SELECT code_solvedate, SUM(solved) AS solved FROM date_count GROUP BY code_solvedate ORDER BY code_solvedate ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT ( code_id, user_id, comment_content, comment_date ) VALUES (#{codeId}, #{userId}, #{commentContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: -- SELECT code_solvedate, code_title, code_level,code_solvedtime SELECT code_id, code_title, code_level, code_solvedtime, code_solvedate FROM code where user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY code_solvedate DESC
SELECT comment_id, code_id, user_id, comment_content, comment_date FROM COMMENT where code_id = #{codeId} ORDER BY comment_id DESC
SELECT U.user_name, U.user_id, c.code_title, C.code_problemid, C.code_solvedate FROM code C JOIN users U ON C.user_id = U.user_id WHERE U.study_id = #{studyId} ORDER BY c.code_solvedate DESC LIMIT 5;
